text: Is it possible to extend the Author Biography in the settings with custom Author fields?
Does anyone know if this is possible?
you can using a HubDB and correlating it to the author names, allowing you to add as many fields as you need.
hi Jon, thanks, unfortunately the customer does not want to pay extra for HubDB
is there a different way of achieving this?
or is he out of options here if he does not want to go with HubDB?

well you can use another blog to pull the data and each post would be the data you need for each author.
it’s not as user friendly but gets the job done
thanks Jon!
that would be a solution
although it leaves me wondering why it is possible to extend so many types of information ( like contact information ) with custom data, but not the author information...

simple, because a blog is structured data, the functionality you’re asking for is not something that every site needs, so it doesn’t make sense to overcomplicate the data structure for something that is rarely needed.

Contact properties however, there is an infinite number of things you might want to store about a person and track
ah that makes sense
thanks for the additional information Jon!
We've added span tags with classes in the author bio area and then just used css to hide/show info in the areas we needed on blogs/cm's
